about_the_game:
Bring your characters to life and give them voices with this new exciting pack from Kadokawa! Featuring both male and female voiceovers, this pack has over 150 expressions covering many of the most important and common phrases your characters will need during their journeys.

Features:

* 46 Brave Male phrases
* 46 Brave Female phrases
* 30 Male Villain phrases
* 30 Female Villain phrases
* All files come in both High Res and Low res versions
* .m4a and .ogg formats included
* All English phrases are spoken by Japanese voice actors
* For use with RPG Maker and Visual Novel games.

Tracklist:
